predicate.note: Frames file for 'silt up' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

role.descr: cause of silting (but not the silt itself), agent

example.name: usually unaccusative
example.text: But then it turned out that President Siad Barrah was not at all a nice person and the Navy pointed out that the base he promised us in Berbera had silted up about a hundred years ago and anyway was 1,244 miles from the mouth of the Gulf.
example.arg: the base he promised us in Berbera
